personalInfo.clubAffl: Los Serranos CC (Chino Hills, California); Arroyo Trabuco GC (Mission Viejo, California)

tourBios.carHigh:
Won multiple events on the Golden State Tour. 

2012: Monday-qualified for the Northern Trust Open on the PGA TOUR, his first TOUR start (missed the cut).

2011: Tied the course record with a 62 at Twin Oaks CC in a Golden State Tour event...Set a course record 62 at Tierra Del Sol en route to a win at the High Desert Classic.

2010: Missed the cut in his first Web.com Tour event, the Soboba Classic.

2008: Won an event on the California Players Tour at Alisal Ranch CC...Made six out of 12 cuts on PGA TOUR Canada. Best finish was a third at the Telus Edmonton Open.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Was two-time Citrus College MVP and won two non-conference tournaments...Won the Western State Conference tournament at Saticoy CC in Somis, Calif.
tourBios.personal: Attended Western Christian High School in West Covina, Calif...Attended Citrus College for two years...First-tee introduction song would be "My Time."...Favorite golf memory was talking to Justin Rose on the putting green at Riviera CC in 2012 after qualifying for his first PGA TOUR event, the Northern Trust Open...If not a professional golfer, would like to be a Navy Seal...Favorite courses played are Winged Foot and Pebble Beach GL...Would like to play Pine Valley and Cypress Point...Lucky charm is a rock...Favorite teams are Stanford Cardinal, Detroit Lions and Los Angeles Lakers...Favorite TV shows are "Shark Tank" and "Pawn Stars."...Favorite movie is "Braveheart."...Favorite athletes are Kobe Bryant and Calvin Johnson...Favorite vacation spot is Oahu in Hawaii...Would like to be a Navy Seal for a day "to see what their real-life situation would be like."...Bucket list includes helping kids in poor countries.
